\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
{\ttfamily $\ast$this} with scalar type casted to {\itshape New\+Scalar\+Type} 
\end{DoxyReturn}
Note that if {\itshape New\+Scalar\+Type} is equal to the current scalar type of {\ttfamily $\ast$this} then this function smartly returns a const reference to {\ttfamily $\ast$this}. \mbox{\Hypertarget{class_eigen_1_1_uniform_scaling_a60dba22bebe9e2c97cfbc76f85eb1b78}\label{class_eigen_1_1_uniform_scaling_a60dba22bebe9e2c97cfbc76f85eb1b78}}
